actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should award the Presidential Medal of Freedom to Martha Raye.

summary.text: Declares that the President should award the Presidential Medal of Freedom to Martha Raye in honor of her meritorious service to the United States.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should award the Presidential Medal of Freedom to Martha Raye.
